record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1899. Sixth row: Jerome Pratt Magee, William Alexander Gordon, and G. A. Brayton; fifth row: George Eugene Tucker, Julian Frank Goodenow, Walter Joseph Schmal, and S. T. Bowen; fourth row: Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), Zelmer Roswell Pettet, Theron Winfred Mortimer, Horace Broadwell Street, Clarence Bert Herschberger, and Alvin Bricker Snider; third row: Fred Graham Moloney, Lee Byrne, Byron Bayard Smith (captain), Donald Ranfall Richberg, and H. B. Conibear, (trainer); second row: Henry Berry Slack, Carter Van Vleck Brown, Parke Ross, Mortimer Brainerd Parker, and Charles Vernon Drew; first row: Ralph C. Hamill, William Arthur Moloney, Daniel Pierson Trude, Charles Lindsey Burroughs, and Ralph Curtis Manning.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
